snippet.title: Remember Me - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Step in the shoes of memory hunter Nilin, in her journey to recover her memory and take down the memory manipulation corporation called Memorize!
Remember Me is available now for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC!
Subscribe to the Official Capcom Unity Channel: 
http://bit.ly/Qjb2MV
